name: Bit Wars
description:
• turn-based strategy
  • by indie game developer
  • puzzle easy to start, hard to master
  • you control terrain not units
  • 16 colors, 16 pixels wide sprites
  • local multiplayer
  • lot of fun!

-- The game is finished and ready for OUYA and WEB --

You can play with other (offline) person on your computer or against AI. You can even run AI vs AI skirmish and just watch :)

Gamepad supported (one gamepad for two players)
